description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国傈僳族政治人物。曾任中共怒江傈僳族自治州委书记、云南省人民政府副省长、党组成员。现任中共海南省委常委，组织部部长，兼省委教育工委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Lisu ethnicity. He has served as Secretary of the CPC Nujiang Lisu Autonomous Prefecture Committee, and Vice Governor of Yunnan Province. He is currently a member of the Standing Committee of the CPC Hainan Provincial Committee, Head of the Organization Department, and concurrently Secretary of the Education Work Committee of the Provincial Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 云南省楚雄彝族自治州下辖的县，纳云德的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Chuxiong Yi Autonomous Prefecture, Yunnan Province, and the birthplace of Na Yunde.

nodes.id: 怒江傈僳族自治州人民政府

zh-cn: 怒江傈僳族自治州人民政府
en: People's Government of Nujiang Lisu Autonomous Prefecture

nodes.id: 中国共产党怒江傈僳族自治州委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党怒江傈僳族自治州委员会
中共怒江傈僳族自治州委
en: Nujiang Lisu Autonomous Prefecture Committee of the Communist Party of China
Hainan Provincial Committee of the CPC

nodes.id: 中国共产党海南省委员会组织部

zh-cn: 中国共产党海南省委员会组织部
en: Organization Department of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China
Education Work Committee of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the CPC

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在南华县的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Nanhua County.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在昭通市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Zhaotong City.

description.zh-cn: 纳云德是云南武定人。
description.en: Na Yunde is from Wuding, Yunnan.

relationships.target: 怒江傈僳族自治州人民政府

description.zh-cn: 2016年3月任怒江傈僳族自治州人民政府代州长，后当选为州长。
description.en: In March 2016, he was appointed acting governor of the People's Government of Nujiang Lisu Autonomous Prefecture and was later elected governor.

relationships.target: 中国共产党怒江傈僳族自治州委员会

description.zh-cn: 纳云德于2017年8月至2023年2月期间担任中共怒江傈僳族自治州委书记。
description.en: Na Yunde served as Secretary of the CPC Nujiang Lisu Autonomous Prefecture Committee from August 2017 to February 2023.

position.en: Vice Governor, Member of the Party Leadership Group

description.zh-cn: 纳云德于2023年1月当选为云南省人民政府副省长，直至2024年8月调离。
description.en: Na Yunde was elected Vice Governor of the People's Government of Yunnan Province in January 2023 and served until his transfer in August 2024.

description.zh-cn: 自2024年8月26日起，纳云德出任中共海南省委常委。
description.en: Since August 26, 2024, Na Yunde has served as a member of the Standing Committee of the CPC Hainan Provincial Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党海南省委员会组织部

description.zh-cn: 自2024年8月26日起，纳云德出任中共海南省委组织部部长。
description.en: Since August 26, 2024, Na Yunde has served as the Head of the Organization Department of the CPC Hainan Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 自2024年12月25日起，纳云德兼任海南省委教育工委书记。
description.en: Since December 25, 2024, Na Yunde has concurrently served as the Secretary of the Education Work Committee of the Hainan Provincial Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 纳云德接替李四明出任怒江傈僳族自治州人民政府州长。
description.en: Na Yunde succeeded Li Siming as the Governor of the People's Government of Nujiang Lisu Autonomous Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 李文辉接替纳云德出任怒江傈僳族自治州人民政府州长。
description.en: Li Wenhui succeeded Na Yunde as the Governor of the People's Government of Nujiang Lisu Autonomous Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 纳云德接替童志云出任中国共产党怒江傈僳族自治州委员会书记。
description.en: Na Yunde succeeded Tong Zhiyun as the Secretary of the Nujiang Lisu Autonomous Prefecture Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 洪维智接替纳云德出任中国共产党怒江傈僳族自治州委员会书记。
description.en: Hong Weizhi succeeded Na Yunde as the Secretary of the Nujiang Lisu Autonomous Prefecture Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 纳云德接替冯忠华出任中国共产党海南省委员会组织部部长。
description.en: Na Yunde succeeded Feng Zhonghua as the Head of the Organization Department of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科页面分类，纳云德曾担任中共南华县委书记。
description.en: According to the categories on his Wikipedia page, Na Yunde served as the Secretary of the CPC Nanhua County Committee.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科页面分类，纳云德曾担任中共昭通市委副书记。
description.en: According to the categories on his Wikipedia page, Na Yunde served as the Deputy Secretary of the CPC Zhaotong Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党怒江傈僳族自治州委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科页面分类，纳云德曾担任中共怒江傈僳族自治州委副书记。
description.en: According to the categories on his Wikipedia page, Na Yunde served as the Deputy Secretary of the CPC Nujiang Lisu Autonomous Prefecture Committee.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科页面分类，纳云德是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the categories on his Wikipedia page, Na Yunde is a member of the Communist Party of China.
